kr.ac.mju.islab

Class RewardAndroidQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • kr.ac.mju.islab.RewardAndroidQuery

  • public class RewardAndroidQuery
extends java.lang.Object
    RewardAndroidQuery class is a port of RewardQuery for Android. Its usage is same as RewardQuery. Check jDoc for RewardQuery for more details.
    Since:
    2017-03-08
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    jwlee

      • recIssueHelperPre

        public byte[][] recIssueHelperPre()
        Returns random serial number s, random number r, and computed value h to Helper. Helper will use there data in recIssue Process. Especially, h will be sent to Master to generate psi.
        Returns:
        the serial number s, random number r, and computed h in Element[] form with corresponding order.

      • recIssueMaster

        public byte[] recIssueMaster(byte[] hBytes)
                      throws java.io.IOException,
                             java.lang.InterruptedException
        Returns element psi which master generates in recIssue Process Helper provides h, and later generates receipt sigma with returned value psi.
        Parameters:
        hBytes - the element generated and provided by Helper
        Returns:
        the mid-computation element psi for Helper
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception of some sort has occurred
        java.lang.InterruptedException - Thrown when a thread is waiting, sleeping, or otherwise occupied, and the thread is interrupted, either before or during the activity

      • recIssueHelperPost

        public byte[] recIssueHelperPost(byte[] rBytes,
                                 byte[] psiBytes,
                                 byte[] yBytes)
        Returns the receipt sigma for Helper. sigma, along with random number s and verification key y, will be used in verification process.
        Parameters:
        rBytes - mid-computation value generate by Helper
        psiBytes - mid-computation value generated by Master
        yBytes - the verification key vk
        Returns:
        the receipt sigma for Helper

               throws java.io.IOException,

        Returns boolean value which indicates the validness of the signature sigma.

        sigmaBytes - the receipt generated by Helper
        sBytes - the random number generated by Helper
        yBytes - the verification key vk
